```{r 1}
# Read CSV files into data frames
df1 <- read.csv("1_imdb_reviews.csv")
df2 <- read.csv("2_imdb_reviews.csv")
df3 <- read.csv("3_imdb_reviews.csv")
df4 <- read.csv("4_imdb_reviews.csv")
df5 <- read.csv("5_imdb_reviews.csv")
df6 <- read.csv("6_imdb_reviews.csv")
df7 <- read.csv("7_imdb_reviews.csv")
df8 <- read.csv("8_imdb_reviews.csv")
df9 <- read.csv("9_imdb_reviews.csv")
df10 <- read.csv("10_imdb_reviews.csv")

# Merge data frames
merged_df <- merge(df1, df2, all = TRUE)
merged_df <- merge(merged_df, df3, all = TRUE)
merged_df <- merge(merged_df, df4, all = TRUE)
merged_df <- merge(merged_df, df5, all = TRUE)
merged_df <- merge(merged_df, df6, all = TRUE)
merged_df <- merge(merged_df, df7, all = TRUE)
merged_df <- merge(merged_df, df8, all = TRUE)
merged_df <- merge(merged_df, df9, all = TRUE)
merged_df <- merge(merged_df, df10, all = TRUE)

# Write the merged data frame to a CSV file
write.csv(merged_df, "merged_imdb_reviews.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
